introduction: 片名：無情刀 (1968)又名： Fight for the Agreement地區: 台灣片種: 功夫/武術对白语言：汉语普通话字幕：中/英導演: 羅熾動作設計: 唐佳 劉家良監製:	黃卓漢蔡彰助演員:	張沖丁瑩王戎(1)盧碧雲張茜西康明李冠章吳炳南蘇金龍巫敏雄江島小寶陳秀英武拉運Fearing an arranged marriage that looms in his future, a young lord escapes his fate by fleeing to the Sichuan Mountains. There he decides to dedicate his life to the study of martial arts and becomes the student of one of the greatest fighters in the land. But fate is not on the young lord's side as his new master is killed by his arch rival. Forced to put his new skills to the test, the young lord sets out on a path of revenge; a path that leads him straight into a deadly fight against the girl he was supposed to marry...who has also been secretly training since the young lord left.
